statements: SELECT * FROM interest_rates WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT id, interest_rate, start_date FROM interest_rates WHERE interest_rate > 3.5 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interest_rate FROM interest_rates WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM interest_rates WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT id, interest_rate FROM interest_rates WHERE interest_rate BETWEEN 2.5 AND 4.5 ORDER BY interest_rate DESC, start_date ASC;
SELECT id, interest_rate FROM interest_rates WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM interest_rates WHERE interest_rate > 3.5 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT id, customer_id, start_date, end_date FROM interest_rates WHERE interest_rate < 2.0 AND start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_id, AVG(interest_rate) AS avg_interest_rate FROM interest_rates GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(interest_rate) > 3.0 ORDER BY avg_interest_rate DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM interest_rates GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_records >= 3 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM InterestRates;
SELECT rate FROM InterestRates WHERE rate_id = 3;
SELECT statement_id, amount FROM AccountStatements WHERE date = '2021-10-15' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM AccountStatements WHERE amount > 1000 AND customer_id = 101 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT statement_id, customer_id, amount, date FROM AccountStatements WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM InterestRates WHERE rate > 3.5;
SELECT statement_id, customer_id, amount FROM AccountStatements WHERE amount < 5000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM AccountStatements GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT AVG(rate) AS average_rate FROM InterestRates;
SELECT * FROM AccountStatements WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY amount DESC, statement_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM interest_rates;
SELECT account_number, customer_name FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT statement_text FROM account_statements WHERE statement_date = '2021-10-01';
SELECT AVG(rate) AS average_rate FROM interest_rates;
SELECT account_number, MAX(balance) AS max_balance FROM accounts;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000
SELECT account_number, customer_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT account_number, MAX(balance) AS max_balance FROM accounts GROUP BY account_number
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_statements FROM account_statements
SELECT * FROM interest_rates WHERE rate BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.5
SELECT * FROM customer;
SELECT name, email FROM customer;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customer;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction;
SELECT name, email FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM account WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT customer.name, account.balance FROM customer JOIN account ON customer.customer_id = account.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE amount < 0 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;

SELECT customer.name AS customer_name, account.balance AS account_balance, transaction.amount AS transaction_amount FROM customer JOIN account ON customer.customer_id = account.customer_id JOIN transaction ON account.account_id = transaction.account_id WHERE customer.name LIKE '%John%' AND transaction.amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts;
SELECT customer_id, balance, interest_rate FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE balance < 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount < 0;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT account_id, balance, interest_rate FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY interest_rate DESC;
